job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer, you will be responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of developing and innovating a digital product, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Our team is dedicated to creating conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of user-facing experiences and integration with existing technology ecosystems, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer, you will work with a team of experts to develop and maintain: The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
job_tasks.justification: This details the development and maintenance of a backend service using specific technologies, a clear software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You will also be responsible for developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of a front-end user interface, a core software development responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Additionally, you will work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.
job_tasks.justification: This involves developing a backend-for-frontend (BFF) with specific endpoints, which is a software integration and development task.

job_tasks.phrase: In addition to these tracks, you will also assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves creating reusable technical components for other teams, a software development and integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Our current focus is on adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities of the digital assistant, strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels, and making the digital assistant voice-enabled.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of systems and adding new functionalities to an existing product, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: And last but not least integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.
job_tasks.justification: While this mentions generative AI, the task described is 'integration', which leans towards the software development aspect of incorporating AI capabilities rather than core model development or prompt engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
job_tasks.justification: Making architectural decisions is a key part of software development and system design.

job_tasks.phrase: Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing quality and speed through automation is a core principle of DevOps and MLOps practices, focusing on the operational efficiency of the developed systems.

soft_skills.phrase: As a Full Stack Developer at KPN, you will play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development.
soft_skills.justification: Playing a leading role in shaping technical direction indicates innovation and ownership of the development process.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
soft_skills.justification: Making and advocating for architectural decisions demonstrates ownership and a proactive approach to innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be encouraged to make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
soft_skills.justification: Convincing others of one's views is a direct indicator of communication and persuasion skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Our passionate team focuses on continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
soft_skills.justification: Continuously optimizing through automation implies a commitment to learning and adapting processes for improvement.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional full-stack software development tasks, including building backend services (Python/Asyncio, FastAPI), front-end UIs (React/Redux), and integrating various systems. While it mentions 'generative AI capabilities', the primary focus and described responsibilities are on the software engineering aspects of developing and integrating these capabilities into a digital assistant. There are no explicit tasks related to model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG. Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, where AI/ML features are integrated into a product, but the core of the role is software engineering.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities and technologies involved. It explicitly states 'Full Stack Developer' and details the front-end and back-end development tasks. The mention of generative AI is in the context of integration, not core AI development, making the classification straightforward.
